widget.name: DynamicBrowserTitle
widget.description: Change the browser title based on a mendix attribute

property.caption: Title attribute
property.description: The value to replace the title with

property.caption: Delay (in ms)
property.description: Optional delay to execute javascript. 0ms delay may result in the title being replaced before mxui is fully loaded. If this occurs than the default page title will overwrite the change.

property.caption: Empty value replacement
property.description: This string will be used when an attribute returns empty. If left blank then nothing will be replaced in the title
